statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.PROD_ID) AS ROW_NO , AA.PROD_ID , dbo.DateCharToChar10(AA.PROD_DATE) AS PROD_DATE , AA.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.PROD_QTY , AA.REMARKS , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.PROD_TRAN AA LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PROD_DATE >= #ST_PROD_DATE#
AND AA.PROD_DATE <= #ED_PROD_DATE#
AND AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO

SELECT AA.PROD_ID , AA.PROD_DATE , AA.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.PROD_QTY , AA.REMARKS , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.PROD_TRAN AA LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.PROD_ID = #PROD_ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UBZ.PROD_TRAN ( PROD_DATE, PRODUCT_ID, PROD_QTY, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #PROD_DATE#, #PRODUCT_ID#, #PROD_QTY#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS PROD_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UBZ.PROD_TRAN SET PROD_DATE = #PROD_DATE# , PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID# , PROD_QTY = #PROD_QTY# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE PROD_ID = #PROD_ID#
statements.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.REG_ID) AS ROW_NO , AA.TRAN_ID AS PROD_ID , AA.PRODUCT_ID AS MATERIAL_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE AS MATERIAL_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME AS MATERIAL_NAME , AA.INV_QTY AS INPUT_QTY FROM UBZ.INVENTORY_TRAN AA LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID WHERE AA.TRAN_ID = #PROD_ID# AND AA.TRAN_TP = 'PU' ORDER BY AA.REG_ID

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.PROD_ID, IT.ITEM_ID) AS ROW_NO , AA.PROD_ID , dbo.DateCharToChar10(AA.PROD_DATE) AS PROD_DATE , AA.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.PROD_QTY , AA.REMARKS , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY AA.PROD_ID ORDER BY IT.ITEM_ID) AS ITEM_NO , IT.PRODUCT_ID AS MATERIAL_ID , P2.PRODUCT_NAME AS MATERIAL_NAME , IT.INV_QTY AS INPUT_QTY , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.PROD_TRAN AA LEFT JOIN UBZ.INVENTORY_TRAN IT ON AA.PROD_ID = IT.TRAN_ID AND IT.TRAN_TP = 'PU' LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS P2 ON IT.PRODUCT_ID = P2.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PROD_DATE >= #ST_PROD_DATE#
AND AA.PROD_DATE <= #ED_PROD_DATE#
AND AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
AND IT.PRODUCT_ID = #MATERIAL_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
